Dash was enjoying his afternoon, glad to be done with school for the day. He had no homework today, so he was in the middle of enjoying his favorite hobby, running! For most normal boys, their parents would not want them to go more than a mile or two from home without supervision, but Dash was different, as he could cover that distance in a brief moment! He went on hundred-mile runs instead, going out of state just on foot. He had gotten good at finding routes that avoided getting him seen, and he always wore his super suit for these dashes, given how normal clothes burned up with the friction, as he found out the hard way.

Either way, after finishing his run, he was on his way home, and he was exhausted, slowing down to a normal running speed for the last mile or so. Little did he know that this was a big mistake. "Ah, just in time!" A cloaked figure in the woods nearby said to themselves as they watched Dash approach from the distance. "My what an adorable little super. I almost hate doing this to him, but I can't give any super special treatment, even the young ones!"

They already had a curse lined up that would be perfect to use to mess up someone with a running-based power. As Dash drew near, they said the incantation, and cast it directly at Dash, who was none the wiser. The sorcerer was even kind enough to give Dash a way out. The curse they cast would make it so that with every step, Dash's feet would get just the slightest bit bigger. It was by such a small amount that only someone with Dash's powers would really be affected by it. It was perfect for nullifying Dash's powers, as he would either run enough to make his feet too big to be useful, or he would figure it out, and realize that he couldn't use his powers anymore if he wanted his feet to remain a normal size. 1344111.content:
Justin was fed up with it. It being Max's annoying pranks, of course. Not to mention his overall incompetency when it came to spell casting. Just the other day he had nearly blown up their entire house, wizard lair and all! And he got off scot free, all because he said he was trying to learn new spells! Of course, Justin and Alex both knew he was lying, but their parents didn't believe them, of course.

Justin decided to do something about it, so he designed his own prank for Max. He was going to offer Max a nice treat everyday that was super delicious and addicting, not to mention super fattening. If Max came back for more because of how good it tasted, then that wasn't Justin's fault. He was just trying to be a nice brother. If Max was going to get away with everything because he was the youngest and least experienced, then Justin was going to treat him as such, making sure he wouldn't lift a finger for food.

Of course, this would result in Max getting pretty fat, but Justin was going to stop this once Max noticed he was getting fat. And he knew this wasn't that mean of a prank, but Justin wasn't much of a prankster to begin with. Despite that, he called for Max and conjured up his first sweet treat: a chocolate cupcake.

Max walked in and once Justin offered him the cupcake, said, "Thanks bro! I was starving." Then he immediately ate the thing in seconds.

Earlier his father, Wayne took the two of them to the lab where he works and unbeknownst to the two older men, Adam got in the way of the size ray when they tried to grow his stuffed bunny. Couple of hours have passed by and Wayne left Nick to babysit Adam. "Dad, why do I have to look after the little brat."

"C'mon Nick, it'll only be for a little bit. I got a call from work and I gotta get back to the lab to help out. Also I don't want them to find out we were there earlier." Wayne whispered that last part to Nick as he strung the strings on his guitar which his kid brother was messing around with earlier. "Hey Jonny, you wanna go to the beach?" Isaac knew that Jonny loved to swim, so he figured this trip was a no-brainer.

As he went to change into his own swim trunks, he saw the statue sitting on his night stand. He thought about leaving it at home, but he figured it was too risky. Sure, robberies weren't all that common where he lived, but he didn't want to risk it at all, feeling that it would be safer on his person. He put it in a picnic basket with the rest of the lunch that he had packed, and he got changed.

Soon enough, the father and son were ready and getting into the car. The two of them wore t-shirts and swim trunks with flip flops. Isaac's were black with a gold stripe running down the outside of each leg while Jonny's were blue with a bunch of sharks on them. Isaac drove his happy excited son to the nearby lake while Jonny said, "Thank you daddy! We're gonna have so much fun!" and Isaac said, "You know it!"

The two arrived at the beach a few minutes later, and already Jonny said, "I'm hungry!" and while Isaac normally would have chided his son and told him to wait until after they swam to eat their lunch, he was feeling famished, too. info.brief_description: Take your favorite boys from any medium and expand them in any way you want!
info.description:
In this interactive, you get to pick any boy you want from a fictional universe and expand them to your heart's desire. This includes weight gain, muscle growth, giant, body part expansion, berry expansion, and any combination you want! Feel free to add in oc's and made-up characters. Out of character is fine, as is changing their age. No age limits or size limits.

Rules:

No gore or death.
No females expanding or in sexual situations.
Other than that, anything goes, as long as a fictional boy expands in some way!
